opportunities.title: Kawai Business Startup 2024
opportunities.organizer: Future Entrepreneurs Club - Foreign Trade University
opportunities.description: A national competition for young entrepreneurs to submit startup ideas and business plans. Participants will compete for a chance to showcase their potential and win prizes.
opportunities.user: Future Entrepreneurs Club - Foreign Trade University

opportunities.title: Data For Life 2024
opportunities.organizer: National Population Data Center - Police Department of Administrative Management of Social Relations, Hanoi University of Science and Technology, Vietnam Television
opportunities.description: An international competition seeking innovative ideas, solutions, and products from young individuals to help develop digital government, society, and economy. Co-organized by the National Population Data Center, Hanoi University of Science and Technology, and Vietnam Television (VTV), with VnExpress as the media sponsor.
opportunities.user: National Population Data Center - Police Department of Administrative Management of Social Relations

opportunities.title: Next Trainee Challenge 2024
opportunities.description: A national business case competition aimed at helping university students interested in Management Trainee roles. The competition includes challenges like aptitude tests, crisis management, and business case-solving, providing a platform for young talents to develop business knowledge and skills.

opportunities.title: D-Prize Challenge 2022
opportunities.description: The D-Prize Challenge aims to seed new ventures that distribute proven poverty interventions. Participants design a business or NGO that delivers a proven poverty intervention at scale. Winning teams can receive up to $20,000 USD to launch their organization in areas where extreme poverty exists.

opportunities.title: Hành Trình Kinh Doanh 2024
opportunities.organizer: Young Economists Club - National Economics University
opportunities.description: Hành Trình Kinh Doanh 2024 is a national business case competition aimed at equipping students with practical knowledge and experience in solving real business problems. Organized by YEC-NEU, the competition provides a platform for participants to showcase their leadership and problem-solving skills.
opportunities.user: Young Economists Club - National Economics University

opportunities.title: REIvolution Ideas: HKU Vietnam Innovation Contest
opportunities.description: REIvolution Ideas is an innovation contest organized by HKU Vietnam to celebrate its 2nd anniversary. The contest focuses on three pillars: Research, Education, and Impact, encouraging youth to propose innovative ideas to shape the future of HKU Vietnam.

opportunities.title: Digital Business Contest 2024
opportunities.description: Digital Business Contest 2024 is a national competition that provides a platform for university students to showcase their talent in e-commerce and digital business. It is supported by VECOM, along with universities, businesses, and government bodies in the field of digital commerce.

opportunities.title: Swin-Biz-Rockstar 2024
opportunities.description: Swin-Biz-Rockstar is an annual business idea competition organized by Swinburne Vietnam, providing a platform for students passionate about startups and entrepreneurship to showcase innovative business ideas.

opportunities.title: MPI 2024
opportunities.description: MPI 2024 is the second annual healthcare startup competition organized by Hanoi University of Pharmacy, aimed at students in the field of medicine and healthcare innovation. The competition encourages students to develop entrepreneurial ideas that improve public health.

opportunities.title: AGRIUP 2024
opportunities.description: AGRIUP 2024 is a national competition seeking young talents passionate about agriculture and agribusiness. Organized by the Faculty of Real Estate and Resource Economics at National Economics University, the competition provides a platform for students to develop innovative ideas in agriculture.

opportunities.title: Startup Vina Investment Fund
opportunities.description: The Startup Vina Investment Fund is a funding initiative aimed at supporting promising startups and entrepreneurs in Vietnam. The fund offers investment opportunities and mentorship to help startups grow and scale their operations.

opportunities.title: KMAC-FTU Global Innovation Ideas 2024
opportunities.description: KMAC-FTU Global Innovation Ideas 2024 is an international innovation contest organized by KMAC and Foreign Trade University, seeking groundbreaking ideas and technological solutions to address global challenges.
